src:
Karim Benzema Tolak Label Legenda Real Madrid, Ini Alasannya
07 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karim Benzema bersikeras menolak label legenda Real Madrid yang perlahan-lahan tersemat pada dirinya. Benzema tetap rendah hati meski baru saja mencapai torehan 50 gol Liga Champions untuk Los Blancos.
Striker 31 tahun ini mencetak dua gol pada kemenangan 6-0 Madrid atas Galatasaray di Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Pertandingan itu jadi suguhan ofensif terbaik Madrid sejauh ini.
Meski sering dikritik, angka Benzema tidak berbohong. Dia hanya kalah dari Cristiano Ronaldo (105) dan Raul Gonzalez (66) perihal gol terbanyak di Liga Champions untuk Madrid.
Kendati demikian, Benzema masih enggan menyandang status legenda. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Karim Benzema Rejects the Real Madrid Legend Label, This Is The Reason
Nov 7 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Karim Benzema insists on rejecting the label of the legend of Real Madrid which is slowly embedded in him. Benzema has remained humble despite only scoring 50 Champions League goals for Los Blancos.
The 31-year-old striker scored two goals in Madrid's 6-0 win over Galatasaray in the Champions League on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. The match was Madrid's best offensive treat so far.
Although often criticized, Benzema figures do not lie. He only lost to Cristiano Ronaldo (105) and Raul Gonzalez (66) regarding the most goals in the Champions League for Madrid.
Nevertheless, Benzema is still reluctant to hold the status of a legend. Read below, Bolaneters!
